channel.title: Morrigans Javelins on a 317! First ever
channel.description:
alright:: This took like 20 mins tops, and i don't think it turned out half bad. rate and give advice
Normal Speed::: [URL=http://img4.imageshack.us/i/javs2.gif/][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/6598/javs2.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img4/javs2.gif/1/][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/javs2.gif/1/w399.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Morrigans Javelins on a 317! First ever
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:12, topic:315163”][quote author=the1337legend link=topic=411584.msg3035795#msg3035795 date=1258750878]
dude, theres people out there with the throw axes as well as the specs, they just don’t release everything. My friend has corporal beast animated with it’s special gfx as well.

The only thing this is was animating a javalin and then changing it’s weapon anim id.

I don’t see why people don’t have that.
[/quote]
you always refer to “friends” never your own work so just stfu, just because you can’t make that sorta shit[/quote]

lol@ufaggot.
